== Quotes ==
{{Quote|With expertise in advertising and gaming since 2007, we help you make advanced animation projects easy, accessible, and fun – delivering stunning results!

Filmic Art is an animation production company led by directors, producers, and animators. But above all, we are storytellers. We bring stories to life with creativity and vision, crafting engaging and immersive experiences. In a spacious penthouse studio located in the Old Town city center of Stockholm, we offer 20 workstations and our own render farm.

Filmic Art’s core strengths include managing large, technical, and highly creative projects in 3D and 2D, a strong creative team with key artists and directors, highly experienced producers, in-house art direction, and designers.

“We create emotions through the art of animation.”|About section of the Filmic Art website}}
